fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you curse your target, they will have an Astral visit for the night that you curse them.

- The night after you curse your target, they will roleblock their target for that night, along with performing their original ability.

- With the Necronomicon, your target will no longer roleblock their target. Instead, they will deal a Basic attack to their target.

- If any target you cursed does not visit anyone the night after you curse them, or they would roleblock or attack a Coven member when visiting, they will be roleblocked or attacked instead.
